_header: Now fell me when this Jubilee thus was made
_description: Charles d’Orléans, a love sequence, consisting of chanson d’aventure adventures of the poet in the realm of Love — 94 stanzas rhyme royal with inserted ‘bill of complaynt’ of seven 8-line stanzas

BLHar682.First Lines: How felle me when þis Iubile þus was madeNot kowde y ellis but wandir vp & downe…
BLHar682.Last Lines: …When þat y fond my tymys of laysereAs sewith next if it lust yow to here
